generated_posts.title: Why AI Won't Replace Developers (It Will Amplify Them)
generated_posts.content:
Hot take: AI doesn't replace developers. It removes the boring stuff so you can do the interesting work.

Here's what our AI assistant (ARETE) actually does:
‚ùå Not: Write your entire codebase
‚úÖ Actually: Generate boilerplate, tests, docs

‚ùå Not: Make architectural decisions
‚úÖ Actually: Implement your specifications

‚ùå Not: Replace code review
‚úÖ Actually: Catch 80% of issues before review

The result? Our developers went from:
‚Ä¢ 60% coding routine CRUD
‚Ä¢ 40% architecture & problem-solving

To:
‚Ä¢ 20% reviewing AI output
‚Ä¢ 80% architecture & innovation

They're not working less. They're working on what matters.

That's amplification, not replacement.

#FutureOfWork #AIandDevelopers #TechInnovation
generated_posts.target_audience: Software Developers, Tech Professionals, Engineering Students
